Install on Ubuntu.val: Installs NASM software on your machine.

NASM Manual.val: Gives the mannual pages for NASM

Assemble Source File.val: Assembles the source file (filename.asm) and creates an object file (filename.o) in the current directory. NOTE: This file is not executable.

Make Executable File.val: Use if program begins with a procedure called "_start". Creates executable file(filename.exe)
Use if program begins with a procedure called "main". Creates executable file(filename.exe)
